title: Love Gears v1.0.92 [PD]
description:
Are you ready to hitch two love monsters together?

No Ads!

The game has been designed to be amazingly challenging and fun to play for those who are looking for sparkling new ways to challenge their intelligence, while they enjoy 54 different levels with colorful graphics and funny characters.

How to play:

Move gears ( cogs ) from one grid cell to another to hitch two madly in love monsters separated by a few unsorted gears! It all started when three monster kids asked their dad how he met their mother. 

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your mission to show them how their parents met by solving addictively fun puzzles. All you have to do is reconnect gears so that monster mom gets to monster dad! The fewer moves you do the more hearts you get! Be careful, in some levels gears move counter-clockwise which will lead monster mom to her death!

Key Features:

- 54 different levels.
- Innovative gear simulation gameplay.
- Use your creativity and intelligence to master different levels.
- Adorable funny characters (Monster Dad, Monster Mom and three Monster Kids)
- Outstanding graphics and animation effects.
- Amazing music and sound effects.
- Reset Game button.
- Level selection menu.
- Progress is saved automatically.
- Available in English language only.
- Every 12,000 downloads, 10 (ten) of our players will get the chance to win $100 (one hundred US Dollars) prize each.

Highly recommended for fans of puzzle games such as: Toobz, Unblock Me, U Connect, Trainyard, Blokus, Legor2, Geared, Glass Tower, Glow Puzzle.
